Reviews.Title: I got this for under 99
Reviews.Author: marklovsU!
Reviews.Content: it was a gift for my brother and I had no idea it came with so much stuff. I was a great deal and it takes good pictures. I like it more then my camera and I paid close to 250 for  mine. So I think its a great deal and camera!

ProductInfo.Features:
2.7-inch TFT color LCD with wide-viewing angle monitor
16.0 megapixel 1/2.3-inch CCD sensor
DIGIC 4 image processor for exceptional performance
5x optical zoom with 28mm wide-angle lens delivers stunning images
Shoot brilliant 720p HD video with a dedicated movie button
ProductInfo.Name: Canon PowerShot A2500 16.0 MP Digital Camera (Red) + 8GB SD HC Memory Card + Point & Shoot Camera Case + Accessory Kit
